title: Pierre Poilievre Is Retained as Leader of Canadaâ€™s Conservatives
summary_full: Pierre Poilievre, a populist who led the Conservative Party to defeat last year, was retained as its leader on Friday, despite his dismal poll numbers.
summary_public: Pierre Poilievre, a populist who led the Conservative Party to defeat last year, was retained as its leader on Friday, despite his dismal poll numbers.
